price: Ampa sε Yɛasεe (amanfoͻ bi) a na wͻte sε mo. Enti obi wͻ hͻ a ͻde bɛtu ne ho foͻ?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
